name: Granny's Recipe
description:
This game is an adventure where the protagonist travels through time to collect ingredients for a beloved family recipe made by their grandmother. The grandmother has Alzheimer's and has forgotten the complete recipe, so the protagonist travels to different eras to collect the ingredients from various family members, filling out photos in a family tree. In the end, the protagonist returns to the present with all the ingredients and the grandmother can make the recipe. The protagonist uses their phone as a time machine to travel to the desired eras.

*The game is in Spanish, currently it's being developed to support English as well*
